mapper.select: SELECT f.`supplier_name`,f.`announcement_date`,f.`amt`,f.`alias`,f.`relationship`,f.`dataSource`,f.`ratio` FROM five_supplier f,company c WHERE f.`company_id`=c.`id` AND c.`id`=#{company_id};

SELECT r.`shareholder_name`,r.`share_type`,r.`number_of_shares`,s.`type`,s.`ratio_after`, s.`ratio_before`,s.`share_change`,s.`increase_decrease`,s.`change_time` FROM shareholder r,stock_alteration s,company c WHERE r.`id`=s.`investor_id` AND r.`company_id`=c.`id` AND c.`id` = #{company_id};
